official_title: A bill to provide for a temporary suspension of the duty on 2-(4-aminophenyl)-6-methylbenzothiazole-7 sulfonic acid until January 1, 1986.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide for the suspension of the duty on 2(4-aminophenyl)-6- methylbenzothiazole-7-sulfonic acid through June 30, 1986.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a temporary suspension of the duty on 2-(4-aminophenyl)-6-methylbenzothiazole-7 sulfonic acid until January 1, 1986.
